Open the Settings app to access device configuration options.
Click "Apps" to access the application settings.
Click on "All apps" to view the list of installed applications.
Scroll down through the list of apps to reveal more options.
Scroll down through the list of all apps, revealing apps such as "Gmail", "Google", and "Google Play services".
Scroll down through the list of apps in "All apps" to view more options.
Scroll down through the list of apps in the "All apps" menu.
Click the search icon to open the search bar.
